 Set Up: .HuntTheWumpus.SetUp (edit)
fitlibrary.DoFixture
start HuntTheWumpus.fixtures.GameDriver

Import
fit
HuntTheWumpus.fixtures
If the player tries to move out of the map, the game should say: "You can't go {} from here."; where {} is the direction.

Expand All | Collapse All
 Included page: DonutMap (edit)
Make map.
start end direction
1 2 E
2 3 E
3 4 S
4 5 S
5 6 W
6 7 W
7 8 N
8 1 N
